name: Tecco Sky Hotel & Spa
address: 72 Le Loi Street, Vinh, Việt Nam
description:
Tọa lạc ở trung tâm thành phố Vinh thuộc tỉnh Nghệ An, Tecco Sky Hotel & Spa cung cấp các phòng nghỉ đồng thời có trung tâm spa, bể sục, sân hiên tắm nắng, tầm nhìn ra cảnh núi non và quầy bar phục vụ đồ uống. Wi-Fi có sẵn miễn phí trong toàn khuôn viên.

Một số phòng tại đây có khu vực ghế ngồi tạo sự thuận tiện cho khách hoặc sân hiên/ban công. Mỗi phòng lắp máy điều hòa theo phong cách hiện đại đều được trang bị TV màn hình phẳng và phòng tắm riêng với chậu rửa vệ sinh (bidet), dép cùng máy sấy tóc nhằm tạo sự thoải mái cho khách.

Khách sạn có quầy lễ tân phục vụ 24 giờ, cửa hàng quà tặng và dịch vụ cho thuê xe hơi.

 Khách sạn cách sân bay Vinh 5 km.

review.comment_positive: Nice and clean.
bữa ăn sáng ngon
review.comment_negative: Đồ nội thất hơi cũ

review.comment_positive:
We just stopped for a 3h break on our motorbike trip. 
Big hotel, clean room.
review.comment_negative:
They kept our passports with them after check in, not the best process for a foreigner especially when travelling abroad. For us was okay as we just slept and restarted our trip, but would suggest to find another way to keep the customer information. 
Would be great if they can add a 3h stay room option :)

review.comment_negative: Das Zimmer roch nach abgestandenem Rauch, am Morgen danach hatten wir Ameisen im Bad und auf der Zahnbürste. Das Zimmerschloss war defekt. Wir mussten unsere Pässe abgeben am Abend zu vor, was wir sonst nie mussten. Ein Foto oder Kopie reichte bis anhin aus.

review.rating: Worst experience of staying in a hotel throughout the whole of South East Asia, Americas and Europe.
review.comment_positive:
If you are travelling by train and having a stop off in Vinh, I recommend you don’t. 
The hotel is clean and the doorman is nice and that’s the best thing I can say about it.
review.comment_negative:
We weren’t welcomed in. I asked if I could get a beer at the bar as we arrived at 9.30pm, originally they said yes to this, then walked over to the bar to be told they wouldn’t serve us. Completely not on when you’ve travelled for a full day. The room itself was clean, however the bed was uncomfortable and made awful noises. The view was taken up by about 19 hanging wires. 
We didn’t feel comfortable with them keeping our passports for the duration of our stay, when everywhere else we have stayed has simply taken a photo of them. 
The breakfast had a lot on offer, but nothing that we would eat from a westerners point of view. 
There aren’t restaurants or many cafes around to go to either. Just a Highlands coffee. 
We’ve stayed in some wonderful places for around £10 a night but to stay here for nearer £20 a night and have the worst experience doesn’t make it justifiable.  
The staff are blunt, they look sad and grumpy. Even if you make the effort to smile and make conversation it’s not worth your time.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ, đủ dùng, nhưng mùi khử trùng hơi nồng.
Bữa sáng đa dạng, khách sạn nằm ngay trung tâm, đi lại thuận tiện
review.comment_negative: Khách sạn đã bắt đầu xuống cấp, nhà vệ sinh có mùi và cửa nhà vệ sinh không đóng kín được. Làm cả phòng cứ có mùi khó chịu

review.comment_positive: điều hoà 1 chiều

The hotel is easy to find and easy to drive in. Staff service was quite well.
review.comment_negative: The room badly designed and the toilette was a disaster! We have to use perfume of my wife to feel better smell before use it.

review.rating: cảm ơn Booking .Khách sạn Nhân viên rất thân thiện ,bữa sang hơi đơn giản một chút nhưng rất ổn .
review.comment_positive: thanhk Khách Sạn . Bạn có đội ngũ Nhân viên tuyệt vời .
Vị trí của ks trên đường từ sân bay về, thuận tiện cho việc đi lại. Quanh khu khách sạn còn có nhiều quán ăn với giá cả hợp lý

review.rating: Pretty mediocre hotel compared to Vietnamese standards
review.comment_positive: The location and breakfast.
review.comment_negative: Water came in through the windows during the heavy rain, shower head wasn't properly attached to the wall. The entire room looked like it could use some redecoration.

review.comment_positive: Sảnh và vị trí
review.comment_negative: Phòng hơi nhà nghỉ. Nhưng mà so với giá thì ok

review.rating: Mình thấy hài lòng và an tâm khi ở tại khách sạn.
review.comment_positive: Khách sạn rất đáng giá tiền: Sạch sẽ, tiện nghi tốt, đồ ăn sáng ngon, vị trí thuận lợi. Đặc biệt là đi cùng gia đình và trẻ nhỏ, rất nên chọn ở tại khách sạn như này, giá tiền trung bình nhưng an toàn sạch sẽ. Nhà nghỉ có thể rẻ hơn rất nhiều nhưng không thể tránh được tình trạng ẩm ướt, không khí không được thoáng hay sạch sẽ như ở khách sạn.
review.comment_negative: Thang máy có tiếng kêu nghe hơi sợ. Nhưng khách sạn có nhân viên kỹ thuật nên việc bảo trì chắc cũng đã được bảo đảm. Chỉ là cảm giác thôi chứ thang máy đi rất ổn.

review.comment_positive: Nhân viên lễ tân thái độ rất ko chuyên nghiệp . Mình cũng làm trong nghành dịch vụ . Nhưng lúc tới nhận phòng thì nhân viên lễ tân ăn nói rất cộc lốc  đưa thẻ phòng và ko giới thiệu bất cứ thông tin gì thêm . Kiểu văn hoá của các bạn như kiểu nhà nghỉ . Ks thì ở trung tâm thành phố nhưng với thái độ tiếp khách như vậy thì sẽ mất khách !!! Mình đã huỷ phòng ngây lập tức dù chưa lên thấu phòng . Chủ đầu tư nên coi lại cách vận hành vì lễ tân là bộ mặt của khách sạn . Cảm ơn
Hat seinen Zweck erfüllt. Wir waren auf der Durchreise. Frühstück war inklusive.
review.comment_negative: Es ist ein Raucherhotel. Die Einrichtung ist abgenutzt. Wir hatten in Vietnam bereits ein besseres Hotel für etwa den halben Preis.

review.rating: Perfect for a one night stay if you’re enroute!
review.comment_positive: Complimentary breakfast was good. No view from our room but that was expected. Room was clean. Front desk staff booked our bus for Ninh Binh with pickup at the hotel. Overall good for a one night stay if you’re using it to move on. Price was good for that reason.
review.comment_negative: We had a small mixup with our bus ticket at the front desk, so make sure you get the QR right when you have them book the ticket. Be advised that if you’re going to Ninh Binh, you’ll get dropped off by the Hanoi bound sleeper bus (you are on) at the Gold Hotel. There are taxis and motorbikes there (they appear out of nowhere) to take you to your homestay or hotel.

- Phòng nhỏ
- Buffet sáng ít đồ ăn

review.comment_positive:
Établissement classique mais très correct. Il est relativement bien situé et proche de nombreux commerces et restaurants et vous avez à disposition un parking pour voiture et/ou moto.
Le personnel parle correctement anglais et est serviable.
review.comment_negative:
Le petit déjeuner était à mon goût très moyen. Il n’y avait pas grand chose et les boissons comme le jus de pastèque, une fois vide, n’était pas remplie une nouvelle fois.
Pour le reste, je n’ai rien à redire.

review.rating: staff was good, spa was horrible
review.comment_positive: the staff couldn’t speak English but they did their best to help us. they solved the issue below properly. location was good and on walkable distance to some shops. the room was nice and big and clean. the staff helped us book a private chauffeur to go the green tea islands which was great! definitely recommend to go there.
review.comment_negative:
we booked a massage at the hotel as we thought this would be good (tecco hotel & spa). we were sent to separate rooms and had to wait there. two ladies came and did our massage… not a good massage!! she was sitting on the massage table (very lazy), was messaging on her phone and even took a phone call during the massage. also we were promised a 1-hour massage but we only got a 20 minute massage. the staff told us that the deal is 20 minute massage and then a spa for the rest of the hour. however, the spa was literally just a shower and a bathtub. if you go to this hotel, then DO NOT take a spa+massage. luckily the staff solved this properly and we only paid for a 20 minute massage. 

breakfast is from 6-8 which is too early. we did it our first night but skipped it on our second day.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công
review.comment_positive: Địa điểm thuận tiện, nhưng hồ bơi hơi nhỏ.
phòng sạch sẽ, địa điểm dễ tìm.
review.comment_negative: phòng twin quá bé, nhà vệ sinh quá chật và đường vào từ cửa quá nhỏ. đồ ăn món ăn có vị như đồ cũ.

review.comment_positive: Bữa ăn sáng cho khách hàng thì ổn định.
review.comment_negative:
Phòng nghỉ lưu trú ở Tecco Sky cần kiểm tra và cải thiện vấn đề đồ đạc, tủ lạnh và máy móc trong phòng.
Hỗ trợ khách ăn mì và nước lọc miễn phí thì hợp lý hơn! Bởi phòng nghỉ diện tích hơi hẹp nhỏ....
Mình trải nghiệm thấy Tecco Sky chưa tốt về tiện nghi.

review.comment_positive:
вкусные завтраки входят в стоимость , удобное расположение, отличный вай фай и в лобби и в номере. классные кровати
рядом банки , продукты , магазины
Nhân viên nhiệt tình
review.comment_negative: Chưa có điều hòa 2 chiều

review.comment_positive:
Very nice breakfast! We loved the fresh egg cooking station. Restaurant staff is very friendly and nice. Can't say the same about reception staff.
Room was clean and the beds were very comfortable!
Very close to the train station!
review.comment_negative:
Reception staff could at least pretend that they like their job when paying customers are around, but it seems to be a common trend in Vietnam that people are not interested in their customers in hotels,tickets offices and stores. 
Our room windows were exactly next to a neighbouring half finished building (2meters away) and we were so lucky that one of the few habited apparments had someone living there who liked to play kids music at 7am every morning. 😀

review.comment_positive: Poměr cena a kvalita vyhovující
review.comment_negative: snídaně by mohly byt bohatší

review.rating: Utterly awful place to stay. Yuck!
review.comment_positive: Absolutely nothing. the place was gross.
review.comment_negative: Everything. Staff were not super friendly, the room was dirty with mold visible on the roof. Couldn’t wait to leave it was so gross. Although we requested being accommodated for our vegan diet they had no food for us and made zero effort.

review.comment_positive: Its OK. Good

review.comment_negative: Không cách âm. Có thể nghe rõ tiếng từ hội trường vọng lại ban đêm, tiếng trẻ em khóc, người bước ngoài sảnh, tiếng xe cộ. Bạn nào muốn yên tĩnh thì chắc ko hợp. Đồ ăn sáng tệ, ko nhiều món và khá chán.

review.comment_negative: Bữa sáng ít món. Nên xịt thuốc diệt muỗi trước khi khách nhận phòng. Hệ thống thoát nước ở phòng 404 nên xử lý cho tốt hơn.

review.comment_positive: Phòng sạch sẽ nhân viên nhiệt tình.
review.comment_negative: Ăn sáng hơi tệ. Ít món. Không đa dạng.

review.comment_positive: The breakfast team was efficient and enough variety. It was OK
review.comment_negative:
Asking to keep my passport, or pay for a deposit more than the total amount. I guess they only do the to foreigners. Lack of trust, and basically keeping leverage over you.
Room was full of hair, not super clean. 
Bathroom does not drain, once you take a shower, it's a slippery hazard. 
I do not recommend this place.

review.comment_positive: Bãi xe rộng, phòng thoáng
Security at the parking lot was friendly. The parking lot is fine. Our room was clean.
review.comment_negative: All furniture (beds, wardrobe doors, doors) in our room is old and makes awful noise. The lamp is disgusting.  Bathroom door doesn't close. There was a lock like in a mall toilets to to keep door close. We had a "great" view on the next building wall. The staff at the reception were not friendly, they never smiled to us. The building looks nice outside, but nothing special inside. The room isn't soundproof. Our room was in front of housekeeper storage, so almost all the time we heard some one walking there and it felt as they're in our room.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Có Ban Công

review.rating: Bien pour une nuit si vous prenez le train
review.comment_positive: Petit dej buffet pas si mal. Chambre grande et literie plutôt confortable.
review.comment_negative: La porte de notre chambre (209) ne se fermait pas. Les toilettes dysfonctionne. Un peu de bruit également.

review.comment_positive: Probably just the location.
review.comment_negative:
Despite the fact that I informed the hotel that I would arrive in the middle of the night (they additionally confirmed this by calling me), the check-in took a good few minutes (it was 2:30 AM). Really too long!

Breakfast (available until 9:00) before the end of serving was very poor. It was good that could order an omelette from the cook (it saved the situation).

Honestly - I do not fully understand where the "delight" over the kindness of the staff comes from. Unfortunately, my stay does not confirm this. I would say the service is so-so.

review.comment_positive: Địa điểm tuyệt vời, thuận tiện cho việc di chuyể. Giá cả hợp lý kèm buffet sáng

review.comment_positive: Tiện nghi cơ bản, nhưng ga trải giường có vài sợi tóc lạ.

Với giá tiền 440.000đ cho 2 người, có buffet sáng thì tương đối hợp lý, khách sạn phù hợp cho khách du lịch di chuyển nhiều ít nghỉ tại phòng, gần ga Vinh và trên đường ra sân bay nên di chuyển thuận lợi.
